00001 #ifndef JSON_SPIRIT_ERROR_POSITION
00002 #define JSON_SPIRIT_ERROR_POSITION

00012 
00013 #include <string>
00014 
00015 namespace json_spirit
00016 {
00017     // An Error_position exception is thrown by the "read_or_throw" functions below on finding an error.
00018     // Note the "read_or_throw" functions are around 3 times slower than the standard functions "read" 
00019     // functions that return a bool.
00020     //
00021     struct Error_position
00022     {
00023         Error_position();
00024         Error_position( unsigned int line, unsigned int column, const std::string& reason );
00025         bool operator==( const Error_position& lhs ) const;
00026         unsigned int line_;
00027         unsigned int column_;
00028         std::string reason_;
00029     };
00030 
00031     inline Error_position::Error_position()
00032     :   line_( 0 )
00033     ,   column_( 0 )
00034     {
00035     }
00036 
00037     inline Error_position::Error_position( unsigned int line, unsigned int column, const std::string& reason )
00038     :   line_( line )
00039     ,   column_( column )
00040     ,   reason_( reason )
00041     {
00042     }
00043 
00044     inline bool Error_position::operator==( const Error_position& lhs ) const
00045     {
00046         if( this == &lhs ) return true;
00047 
00048         return ( reason_ == lhs.reason_ ) &&
00049                ( line_   == lhs.line_ ) &&
00050                ( column_ == lhs.column_ ); 
00051 }
00052 }
00053 
00054 #endif
